p: The tensile strength obtained for SiO 2/epoxy nanocomposites with different weight parts of nano-SiO 2 particles in nanomaterials system is plotted in Figure 9. It shows that the tensile strength of nanocomposites increases with the addition of SiO 2 nanoparticles up to 1.5 weight parts, where the value of tensile strength reaches its maximum and then decreases with further additions. The tensile strength of nanocomposites with 1.5 weight parts of nano-SiO 2 particles increased remarkably up to 36.38 MPa in comparison with the pure epoxy resin with a tensile strength of 12.60 MPa.
